text: Anyone used android job scheduler library of Evernote? Or android-job-queue library of yigit boyar from github? I want to hear your experiences with those libraries
<@U0L2TDNSZ> I have used android-job-queue. I have been using this in production since last 6 months. anything specific you want to know?
Hi all, Does any one know any image annotation library where in user can mark spots and add text over image?

attachments.fallback:
[October 24th, 2016 11:18 AM] jemshit: Hi :hand: Anyone has experience with this classes, which one of these is suitable for which use case? Classes are `Service`, `GCMNetworkManager`, `DownloadManager`, `JobScheduler`, `AlarmManager`. 
My needs are *downloading image task*, in the background, independent from app lifecycle, dependent on network state with rescheduling if fails.
